name: @twodashes/universal
description: Universal utility functions for both browser and node (like @lodash, but with more dashes). Mostly "pure" functions (sorting ones use [].sort()). Promises, filtering, sorting, combining, text analysis, math, curry, sleep, etc. See also platform specific functions @twodashes/node and @twodashes/browser.
scripts_docs: 1. **cut_index** - Copy ./esm/index.js to ./index.mjs (so it does not get converted in next step)
4. **cjs_index** - Convert ./esm/index.js to ./cjs/index.js (so it can get processed without reference to other files)

scripts.dist: rm -rf .parcel-cache && rm -rf umd && mkdir umd && rm -rf umd && parcel build esm/*.js -d umd --public-url .
scripts.cjs: rm -rf cjs && rollup esm/arr.js --format cjs --dir cjs/ --exports auto -p @rollup/plugin-node-resolve
scripts.umd: rm -rf umd && rollup esm/*.js --format umd --dir umd/ --exports auto -p @rollup/plugin-node-resolve
